alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sullivan County through 415 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Liberty, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Neversink, Parksville, Swan Lake, Willowemoc, Aden, Mongaup Pond Campground, Bradley, Ferndale and Debruce. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 99 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm.
